nodes.text: Eriquel was a Human male who lived during the Cold War between the Galactic Republic and the reconstituted Sith Empire and resided on the planet of Balmorra. He made his living by working as a crew skill trade vendor. Eriquel was of average height for a Human and had light tan skin with brown hair.
Eriquel first appeared as a vendor in the video game Star Wars: The Old Republic. The accompanying Prima Games guide, Star Wars: The Old Republic Explorer's Guide, labeled him as "Eriq Donnel."
